CustomField.description:
This field is updated by the following processes: 1 Opportunity Creation: (Flow) Opportunity: Populate Territory Id After Insert 2 Opportunity Update (Only when Ultimate Consignee is updated): (Flow) Opportunity: Populate Territory Id After Update 3 Ultimate Consignee Account is moved to a different territory: (BatchClass) BatchToUpdateOppTerritory2Id
Note: Batch is run on Monday following the new ETM model activation, Accounts don't move territories during the quarter
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field displays the Ultimate Consignee's territory
